懆字的基本解释

懆
cǎo
〔懆懆〕忧虑不安。

懆
sāo
古同“??”，骚动。

懆
sào
贪图。

懆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cǎo］
［《廣韻》采老切，上晧，清。］
(1)忧愁不安。
(2)急躁。
[②]［sāo］
［《集韻》蘇遭切，平，心。］
骚动。
[③]［cǎn］
同“慘1”。

懆字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懆； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页405第17
【廣韻】采老切【集韻】【韻會】采早切，?音草。【說文】愁不安也。从心喿聲。【詩·小雅】念子懆懆。　又【集韻】七感切。與慘通。義同。　又【集韻】先到切，音噪。貪也。　又七到切，音慥。義同。　又【集韻】蘇遭切，音騷。【說文】動也。本作慅。　又【集韻】倉刀切，音操。愁也。

懆字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懆字的起名意思

暂无。

anxious

〔懆懆〕 Anxiety.

anxious

covet.
anxious
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cǎo］
["Guangyun" picks old cuts, Shanghao, Qing. ]
(1) Sadness.
(2) Impatient.
[②]［sāo］
["Ji Yun" Su Zuo cut, flat , heart. ]
commotion.
[③]［cǎn］
Same as "Misery 1".
anxious
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懆; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 405 17
[Guangyun] Picking old cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Picking early cuts, sound grass. [Said the text] Anxiety too. Voice from the heart. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Nianzi is melancholy.　[Jiyun] Seven senses. And miserable. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] First come first, the sound is noisy. Greedy too.　 Seven to cut again, Yin Yang. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Su Zuoqie, Yin Sao. [Said the text] Move too. This is a poem.　[Jiyun] Cangdao cut, sound operation. Worry too.
